about_the_game:
Are you ready to build the biggest parking space in the city?

Park Control Simulator is a parking space management game. In the game, you can improve the parking space and make more visitors come by pleasing your visitors. You should pay attention to the cleanliness of the parking space because not paying attention to the cleanliness may cause your parking space to be closed with the complaints that will come. You have to pay the rent of your park and your house, and at the same time, you can ensure the personal development of your character in the game with the profit you provide. You can expand your parking space by renting new zones, buy statues, replace benches and garbage cans, and increase the number of visitors to your park. All the strategy and planning is in your hands. Remember, the right investments can make your parking space the biggest park in the city. Be careful, do not go bankrupt!

Are you ready to build the biggest parking space in the city?

Park Control Simulator is a parking space management game. In the game, you can improve the parking space and make more visitors come by pleasing your visitors. You should pay attention to the cleanliness of the parking space because not paying attention to the cleanliness may cause your parking space to be closed with the complaints that will come. You have to pay the rent of your park and your house, and at the same time, you can ensure the personal development of your character in the game with the profit you provide. You can expand your parking space by renting new zones, buy statues, replace benches and garbage cans, and increase the number of visitors to your park. All the strategy and planning is in your hands. Remember, the right investments can make your parking space the biggest park in the city. Be careful, do not go bankrupt!
name: Park Control Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Double Core 2 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 || Radeon RX 560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel I5-8400 || AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1660/Radeon RX 590 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Park Control Simulator is a parking space management game. Take care of cleanliness, improve the parking space and please the visitors. Are you ready to build and manage the most beautiful park in the city?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Albanian
